string.value: Event starts in the event field.

Move to designated location using the Teleport portal.

string.name: evolreload

string.name: antimacro ??ID ??

string.name: mmon ????
string.value: Opens the minimap in the field where the character is currently located.

string.name: mmoff ????
string.value: Folds the minimap in the field where the character is currently located.

string.name: uiclose ??
string.value: Closes the UI that is relevant to the designated number.

Hires the designed character.

string.name: chase ?? ????
string.value: Moves to the target's location.

string.name: ban ????
string.value: Ends the connection for the applicable character.

string.value: Increases/Reduces the EXP up to the designated amount.

string.name: honorexp ?

string.name: charmexp ?

string.value: Carries out Skill Steal on the skill appropriate for the level.

string.name: revive
